paragraph: Eventhut is a web platform which allow users to discover and book slot for their favorite events. Frontend for this app is build using React and for Backend I have used Strapi
Snackstore is a online food-ordering single page web application. This app is build using React, Context API and Firebase Authentication Service
A prograssive web application to find ratings and parental guide for the newest movie. I used React, React Router and TMDB API in order to create this website
Video-chat-v1 is a video chat app that makes it easy to groups up with people you want to meet. This app is build using NodeJS, Socket.io, and Peerjs(WebRTC)
